official_title: A bill to designate the United States Post Office Building located at 2120 South Ervay in Dallas, Texas, as the "Juanita Craft Post Office of South Dallas".

summary.text: Designates the United States Post Office Building located at 2120 South Ervay in Dallas, Texas, as the Juanita Craft Post Office of South Dallas.

titles.title: A bill to designate the United States Post Office Building located at 2120 South Ervay in Dallas, Texas, as the "Juanita Craft Post Office of South Dallas".
